title: Foggy city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A foggy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (customWeather). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.2 m/s). There are 9 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a foggy city street. There are several other cars on the road, some of which are also braking. A pedestrian is crossing the street at a crosswalk. The traffic lights are visible in the distance.
reasoning: The foggy weather reduces visibility, making it important for the ego vehicle to maintain a safe distance from other vehicles. The multiple braking events suggest that the other cars are also adapting to the reduced visibility. The pedestrian crossing the street at a crosswalk requires the ego vehicle to slow down and stop, ensuring the safety of the pedestrian.
